vn.map4d.map.annotations

Class MFPolygonOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • vn.map4d.map.annotations.MFPolygonOptions

  • public class MFPolygonOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines options for a polygon.

      This method is no longer acceptable. Use fillColor(int) instead Set fill alpha chanel of the polygon. The default value is 1.0. The value must be in range [0.0, 1.0]

      • fillColor

        @Deprecated
public MFPolygonOptions fillColor(java.lang.String color)
        Deprecated. This method will be removed in a future release. Please use fillColor(int) instead of. Sets the fill color of the polygon as 24 bits HEX color. The default color is red (#FF0000) Refer this page to get HEX color code: link
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        this MFPolygonOptions object with a new fill color set.

      • strokeWidth

        public MFPolygonOptions strokeWidth(float width)
        Set stroke width of the polygon. The default value is 1.0. The value must be greater than or equal to 0.
        Parameters:
        width - the polygon's stroke width. This must be strictly positive, otherwise an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.
        Returns:
        this MFPolygonOptions object with a new width set.

      • visible

        Returns:
        this MFPolygonOptions object with a new touchable set.
